name: -crf
explanation: Select the quality for constant quality mode (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default -1)

name: -aq-mode
explanation:
0.none
1.variance: Variance AQ (complexity mask)
2.autovariance: Auto-variance AQ
3.autovariance-biased: Auto-variance AQ with bias to dark scenes

name: -ssim
explanation: Calculate and print SSIM stats. (default auto)
